attributes.action: allow Mr Damilola Ajagbonna to be granted a full British passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having moved here many years ago Mr Damilola Ajagbonna is facing deportation.  He is clearly someone who would eventually not only give more back to society that he takes out, he would be a fine role model for young men, both black and white.

At a time when there are many foreign-born undesirables being allowed to reside here, it seems totally correct to review Damilola's case and allow him to live here for good.

More details about Damilola Ajagbonna can be found here

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/pages/live/articles/news/news.html?in_article_id=480662&in_page_id=1770&in_page_id=1770&expand=true#StartComments

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
